title: Style at Home Magazine font
content:
Style at Home Magazine font. Can someone identify the header font? Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080918075022im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1008cover-large_6691.jpg)

 [‹ Can you help me identify this font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080918075022/http:/typophile.com/node/49396 "Go to previous forum topic") [Fat high-contrast face similar to Bodoni ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080918075022/http:/typophile.com/node/47663 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ihearttypography
